revolver 0.3.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

CCF()

Extract CCF/binary data for a patient

CCF_clusters()

Extract cluster-level CCF/binary data for a patient

CCF_parser()

Builtin CCF parser function.

Clonal_cluster()

Return the id of the clonal cluster for this patient

Cluster()

Extract fitted model for a patient

Data()

Extract CCF/binary data for a patient

Drivers()

Extract CCF/binary driver data for a patient

ITransfer()

Extract the information transfer for a patient's tree

Phylo()

Extract phylogenetic or mutation trees for a patient

Samples()

Extract samples name for a patient

Stats()

Return summary stastics for the cohort's patients

Stats_cohort()

See Stats function.

Stats_drivers()

Return summary stastics for the cohort's drivers

Stats_fits()

Return summary stastics for the cohort's fits

Stats_trees()

Return summary stastics for the cohort's trees

Subclonal()

Extract CCF/binary data for subclonal mutations of a patient

TRACERx_cohort

Analysis of the TRACERx cohort, with REVOLVER. The input object ofr the analysis is "TRACERx_data"

TRACERx_data

TRACERx mutation and CNAs Data by Jamal-Hanjani et al., prepared for REVOLVER.

Truncal()

Extract CCF/binary data for truncal mutations of a patient

get_features()

Return summary features for the cohort.

plot(<rev_cohort>)

Cohort summary scatterplot.

plot(<rev_cohort_fit>)

Fits summary scatterplot.

plot(<rev_phylo>)

S3 method that plots a REVOLVER tree.

plot_DET_index()

Plot the DET index.

plot_data()

Plot the data for a patient.

plot_data_clone_size()

Plot the clone size data for a patient.

plot_data_clusters()

Plot the clusters data for a patient.

plot_data_histogram()

Plot the data histogram for a patient.

plot_data_mutation_burden()

Plot the mutation burden for a patient.

plot_data_oncoprint()

Plot the oncoprint for a patient.

plot_graph_drivers()

Plot summary statistics for the drivers on a graph.

plot_information_transfer()

Plot the information transfer of a tree.

plot_penalty()

Plot the fit penalty

plot_trees()

Plot REVOLVER trees for a patient

plot_trees_scores()

Plot a barplot of the scored trees for a patient.

print(<rev_cohort>)

Print a "rev_cohort" object

print(<rev_cohort_fit>)

Print a REVOLVER cohort object with fits.

print(<rev_phylo>)

Print a "rev_phylo" object.

revolver_check_cohort()

Check basic inconsistencies in a REVOLVER cohort.

revolver_cluster()

Compute hierarchical clustering for a REVOLVER cohort

revolver_cohort()

Construct a REVOLVER cohort object (S3 class "rev_cohort").

revolver_compute_CLtrees()

Compute/ add mutation trees to a REVOLVER cohort.

revolver_compute_phylogenies()

Compute/ add CCF-based phylogenies to a REVOLVER cohort.

revolver_deletePatients()

Subset the patients in the cohort to match the input list.

revolver_fit()

Fit a REVOLVER model.

revolver_jackknife()

Computation of fit confidence with the jackknife.

revolver_phylogeny()

REVOLVER constructor for a tree

revolver_plt_jackknife_coclust()

Plot jackknife statistics for co-clustering (heatmap).

revolver_plt_jackknife_coclust_bplot()

Plot jackknife statistics for co-clustering (boxplot).

revolver_plt_jackknife_edge_counts()

Plot jackknife statistics for the number of patients with an edge.

revolver_plt_jackknife_edge_prb()

Plot jackknife statistics for edge detection probability.

revolver_removeDriver()

Remove a driver event from a cohort.

revolver_subsetDrivers()

Subset the drivers in the cohort to match the input list.

stats.rev_phylo()

Compute statistics for a "rev_phylo" tree.

summary(<rev_phylo>)

Summary of a "rev_phylo" object.

Contents

  • All functions
